text: Pieter Rosalia Van Den Bosch (31 October 1927 – 31 January 2009) was a Belgian international footballer. He participated at the 1954 FIFA World Cup, alongside brother Hippolyte. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2009 deaths Category:Belgian footballers Category:Belgium international footballers Category:1954 FIFA World Cup players Category:K. title: Pieter van den Bosch (footballer)
